sole.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the sole person, thing etc is the only one
sole.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: the sole American in the room
Griffiths is the sole survivor of the crash.

sole.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Derek has sole responsibility for sales in Dublin.

sole.translation[0].note_box[0].heading: – Meaning 1: the sole person, thing etc is the only one
sole.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: Their sole purpose was to kill.
His sole reason for calling was to shower abuse upon me.
I’m not saying that TV violence is the sole cause of violence in society.

sole.translation[0].note_box[1].heading: – Meaning 2: not shared with anyone else
sole.translation[0].note_box[1].sections: She has the sole responsibility for a large family.
